messages.subject: Re: New Hampshire Primary and unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: Well, the Bush family is deep into the Gothard/H$LDA type stuff, so I would be real leary of George W.  Besides, I don t like folks who refuse to answer
messages.messageBody:
Well, the Bush family is deep into the Gothard/H$LDA type stuff, so I would
be real leary of George W. Besides, I don't like folks who refuse to
answer questions which is another one of his favorite things to do. To me,
if you refuse to answer a question about possible drug use you have as good
as admitted that you did.

The democrats are notorious in their NEA beliefs, so that is another
problem. Of course, that is being addressed by a letter writing campaign.

So, I can't say who I would vote for, simply who I wouldn't vote for. Gee,
aren't I helpful <g>

Lynda

----------
From: "Beth Burnham" <beth2002@...>

I am supposed to go vote tomorrow and it's supposed to influence the
country so if anyone wants to tell me who they think should be the best guy
to vote for president and if anyone is better for unschooling or not I am
still undecided and would be happy to listen to what anyone here has to
say.
Thanks
Beth

Message boards, timely articles, a free newsletter and more!
Check it all out at: http://www.unschooling.com
